name: ele.width
descr: Get the width of the element.  The raw width of the element is returned, independent of whether the element is visibile.

formats.name: ele.width
formats.descr: Get the width of the element in [model dimensions](#notation/position).

formats.name: ele.outerWidth
formats.descr: Get the outer width of the element in [model dimensions](#notation/position) (includes width, padding, & border).

formats.name: ele.renderedWidth
formats.descr: Get the width of the element in [rendered dimensions](#notation/position).

formats.name: ele.renderedOuterWidth
formats.descr: Get the outer width of the element in [rendered dimensions](#notation/position) (includes width, padding, & border) in rendered dimensions.
